name: Sasha
concept: The Grand Conspiracy Theorist / Anarch Strategist
haven: Abandoned desert shack with a cryptic, diagram-filled basement (outside city limits)
goal: To acquire a Malkavian artifact to prove the Prince's 'death and return' is political theater orchestrated by the Methuselahs.

merits_flaws.name: Prophetic Visions
merits_flaws.description: Receives cryptic, accurate visions of future events, often related to Kindred politics.

merits_flaws.name: Derangement: Paranoia
merits_flaws.description: Believes all non-Anarchs are part of the grand conspiracy, making cooperation difficult.
